title: Issuing of passports to resume from Tuesday
body_lines: The passport issuing services excluding the one day service will resume from Tuesday (9), Immigration and emigration department said.
While issuing a notice, the Department said the services of issuing passports were suspended from last Friday (5) due to an emergency repair of their computer system.
Accordingly, the passport issuing service under the normal service will resume on Tuesday. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
